hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: TARGET_STACK
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Based on selection we determine if it is the a or b stack.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If you want to a specific branch. Leave blank to use the release control

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DATA_S3_OBJECT_KEY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional. Setting this value will update related files, folders, datasets, etc.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GENOMIC_DATASET_S3_OBJECT_KEY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional. Setting this value will update related files, folders, datasets, etc.
